articles.author: Steven Brown
articles.title: Man who fainted in front of Prince Charles explains what really happened - Express
articles.description: THE ASDA worker who fainted in front of Prince Charles during a royal visit this week has revealed what really happened - and shed light on a touching gesture from the Prince of Wales after his scare.

articles.author: Bethany Minelle
articles.title: Valentina Sampaio: Sports Illustrated features first transgender model - Sky News
articles.description: The Brazilian-born model said the transgender community faces "closed doors to peoples' hearts and minds" in her home nation.

articles.description: The This Morning presenters are still starring on the Channel 4 show
articles.content:
